sentences.sentence: Or take a bilberry supplement every morning.
Spread bilberry jam on your morning toast. Or take a bilberry supplement every morning.
sentences.translation: 在你的吐司里面涂上覆盆子酱，或每天早晨吃一个覆盆子。

sentences.sentence: Blueberry and bilberry supply visual purple which nourishes rhodopsin which activates cones and rods.
sentences.translation: 蓝莓及山桑子供应紫光的视紫红质的滋养和激活视锥杆。
